description: This is a test file for the FilterProvider class in a Flutter project. It verifies the initial state, setter methods, toggle functions, range updates, and reset functionality of the FilterProvider. The file uses the flutter_test package and references models like FilterCriteria, Race, HairColor, Religion, and Range.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A state management class that holds filter criteria for user preferences, allowing updates and notifying listeners.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Defines a test group for testing the FilterProvider class, checking for correct behavior in initial state, updates, toggles, and reset.
